alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Crawford; Grant; La Crosse; Richland; Trempealeau; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 2:33AM CST until December 28 at 9:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Another Round of Snow and Freezing Drizzle Expected Today into This Evening... .Snow will spread across the area this morning. Snow accumulations will range from 1 to 3 inches. This snow will transition to freezing drizzle during the mid to late afternoon and then continue into this evening. Like Sunday night, expect slick roads with reduced visibilities at times. Anticipate slippery to hazardous travel, slow down, and allow extra time to reach your destination. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Wisconsin, northeast Iowa and southeast Minnesota. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa, 511mn.org in Minnesota, and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Crawford; Grant; La Crosse; Richland; Trempealeau; Vernon
